title: 36 Hours
description:
A disastrous past few days starting with hiring Intern Little Jack and culminating with a random email from a Dave Portnoy impersonator (00:00:05). Tom Brady had a change of heart and decided to come back to football (00:16:40). Jussie Smollett was sentenced on Thursday and a former cast-mate calls for his release (00:35:20). We don't know why Dan Le Batard made a music but it was pretty successful (00:42:40). Former Minifan, DEC, gets aggressive with Chipotle on Twitter after they gave him exactly what he wanted (00:46:30). Gerry Callahan takes some calls, Big Cat joins and more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
